definitions.definition: A mineral occurring in tetragonal crystals, usually of a brown or grey colour and consisting of silica and zirconia .
A crystal of zircon, sometimes used as a false gemstone .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A mineral occurring in tetragonal crystals, usually of a brown or grey colour and consisting of silica and zirconia .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A crystal of zircon, sometimes used as a false gemstone .
